participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Caring and nurturing, with a love for nature and adventure.
participant_1.background: I like to watch my dolphins swimming in the ocean. I was a musician before my current job. I enjoy horseback riding. I am a full time mom. I enjoy putting alcohol in my coffee.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and sociable, with a passion for cooking and the outdoors.
participant_2.background: I got to know my girlfriend better in the past year. I decided to travel the world with my sister, Mary. I am an avid fisherman. I like to share my recipes with my friends and learn new ones from them. and, my best friend is Calden.

content.text: Hi there!  How is your day going?
Hello there!  It is going well, thanks for asking!  What about yours?
It is going well too!  I am a full time mom and I really love it.  What do you do for work?
I am a professional fisherman and I love it!  I am currently traveling the world with my sister.
Wow, that sounds like an amazing job!  I have always wanted to travel the world.
It is amazing!  I have been to so many different places and met so many different people.
That sounds like so much fun!  What is your favorite place that you have been to?
My favorite place was the Maldives.  It is so beautiful and peaceful there.
That sounds amazing!  I would love to go there someday.
You definitely should!  It is a must see place.
I will definitely put it on my list!
Awesome!  I am sure you will love it.
